description:
go/scanner: reject BOMs that are not at the beginning

For compliance with gc. See also issue 5265.
Not Go1.1 critical, but harmless.

messages.text:

go/scanner: reject BOMs that are not at the beginning

For compliance with gc. See also issue 5265.
Not Go1.1 critical, but harmless.
